basics.name: Johnathan Galinato
basics.label: Staff Sergeant (E-5), Hawaii Air National Guard/nHeavies Integrated Avionics/n Secret Security Clearance
Student
Staff Sergeant (E-5), Hawaii Air National Guard/nHeavies Integrated Avionics/n Secret Security Clearance
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2025.

highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee multiple aircraft for mission capability.
Deployed to Guam from June to August 2022 to support 146 sorties, received 184 aircraft, and offloaded 3.7 million pounds for aircraft aerial refueling.

work.summary: 'Educate' guests about LuluLemon products, fabrics, and direct customers to the products of best interest.
highlights: Explained products, fabrics, and activities for intended uses while creating a tailored shopping experience particular to each guest.
Created a welcoming environment for guests on the floor and cash register while assisting them, resulting in a positive guest return rate.
Coordinated with the team on flow of guests and products on the floor during Black Friday rush, resulting in a goal break of over $20k.

work.summary: Assisted guests with any technical questions about products and directed to preferred Apple device to satisfy their everyday needs.
highlights: Studied unique parts of Apple products that distinguishes a product from others.
Utilized Apple’s SEED app to increase Apple and sales knowledge.
Maintained a pristine environment to showcase Apple products.
Educated guests on Apple products, guiding them to the device best fit for the guest’s needs, including Apple Care+.

work.summary: Assist Guests with any electronic questions and direct guests to the correct product.
highlights: Executed sales floor revisions and product security and provided welcoming guest support.
Surpassed monthly sales goals set by Target Headquarters by 15% for 6 months.
Initiated cross-department training and assistance; Increased team members’ knowledge of each department operation; Overall improvement of team member coverage availability.
Utilized technological knowledge to further assist guests with product replacements, technical questions, and product recommendations.

awards.title: Air and Space Achievement Medal
awards.summary: Outstanding achievement while assigned to the 506th Expeditionary Air Refueling Squadron. Displayed stellar airmanship and exemplified the core values while performing aircraft maintenance for four assigned and seven transient KC-135R aircraft as a member of the Pacific Command's Theater Support Package.

leadership.title: Airmen Leadership Training (Remote)
highlights: Completed a 6-month leadership training for becoming a well-rounded direct supervisor over Airmen.
Utilized multiple techniques of confrontation, personal guidance, and operational guidance.
Created various Air Force Forms to recognize an individual’s excellency and areas of improvement.
